data.name: Blinded by Fear
data.detailed_description:
Blinded By Fear is an indie survival horror game with an unsettling core mechanic. In a dark twist of fate, you awake blinded, your eyes replaced with Lidar, a Light Detection and Ranging system. Instead of being able to see, you must constantly stay vigilant and scan your surroundings lest you fall foul of the darkness that dwells deep within the blackness



You cannot see. Only terminals left behind by the mysterious employees of the facility can guide you.
Uncover a gripping mystery about the facility. Sound is your friend and your enemy. Hack terminals, read logs, solve puzzles as you immerse yourself in a world dripping with a foreboding atmosphere

Inspired by classic survival horror along with lidar based games Blinded By Fear gives you a horror experience like no other!

data.short_description: Blinded by Fear is a survival horror experience with a twist. You can't see anything! Navigate a 3D world with a novel lidar based sight mechanic. Solve puzzles, uncover a twisted mystery and confront unseeable horrors dwelling in the darkness. Can you survive when you are Blinded by Fear?
